entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
